snippet.title: Nintendo Cuts 3DS Price by $80, Cuts Profit Forecast by 80%
snippet.description: It's strange to see video game giant Nintendo in the most dire straits of all the console manufacturers, in spite of formerly trouncing them in sales with each having their own respective issues (Microsoft's Red Ringing an Sony's PSN hacks specifically). But now Nintendo is the one in the tough spot, [...] read »

snippet.title: Xbox Sales Surging, Meaning No New Console Necessary
snippet.description: We all know due to the inability of the internet to keep a secret for more than a few minutes that Nintendo is debuting a new console at E3. "Project Cafe" as its codenamed is a necessary step for the company as Wii sales are lagging and the 3DS is [...] read »
